page.title: 04Patchway Children's Toys
page.content: My best toys are my roller boots and my "Get Along Gang" figures. They are plastic and they are animals. I like my dolls. I have three little ponies. They are plastic models with tails and manes that you can plait. I have the stable and grooming parlour. You can play with your ponies in it. My best game is "Pac-man". You have a plastic man and he eats all of the marbles on the board. I have "Mini-Munch-Man". It is an electronic game just like "Pac-man". I have a "Care Bear", it is a big yellow bear, I like her very much. I want to get a "Cabbage Patch Kid" for my birthday and I want a big "Get Along Gang" Teddy. I have a telephone that leads into my brothers bedroom and we can ring each other up.
